How to Use the HealthCare App

Welcome to the HealthCare App! Here’s how you can easily take charge of your health:

1. Get Started:
Download the app from the Play Store and sign up or log in to your account. It only takes a minute!

2. Allow Access:
Let the app access your phone's sensors to start tracking your steps, heart rate, and sleep patterns. Don’t worry, your data is safe with us!

3. Track Your Health:
Open the app anytime to see your real-time stats like how many steps you’ve taken today, your heart rate, or how well you slept last night.

4. Set Your Goals:
Want to walk 10,000 steps a day or sleep 8 hours every night? Set your goals in the app and let us cheer you on!

5. Stay Motivated:
Enable notifications to get gentle reminders to move, rest, or meet your goals. We’re here to keep you on track.

6. See Your Progress:
Check the “Trends” section to view your health history, track your improvements, and celebrate your milestones.

The HealthCare App is your daily companion for a healthier, happier life. Take small steps, and we’ll help you achieve big results!
